text: Myawaddy is a town in southeastern Myanmar, in Kayin State. "Shwe Kokko casino, entertainment and tourism complex" was built at a cost $15 billion.https://www.bangkokpost.com/thailand/general/2949385/thailand-denies- mistreating-detained-chinese-gambling-kingpin. Retrieved 2025-01-28 ==Armed conflict== In April 2024, the town was (taken back or) recaptured by government forces. Earlier that month, there was a battle in the outskirts of Myawaddy;https://www.bangkokpost.com/thailand/general/2776056/junta-soldiers- await-help-to-retake-myawaddy?tbref=hp. Retrieved 2024-04-15 The Karen National Union (KNU) and People's Defence Force (PDF) took control of the town..https://www.bangkokpost.com/thailand/general/2774216/rebels-attacking- last-government-base-in-myawaddy.
